summary: An outlaw tries to avoid interference as he journeys to Mexico to pull off a $2,000,000 gold robbery.
cast: Yul Brynner|Richard Crenna|Leonard Nimoy|Daliah Lavi|Jo Ann Pflug|Jeff Corey|Michael DeLano|Julián Mateos|David Ladd|Bessie Love|Robert Logan|John Clark|Dan van Husen|Cass Martin|José Nieto|Ángel del Pozo|Víctor Israel|Erika López|Tito García|Antonio Padilla|Rafael Albaicín|Alejandro de Enciso|Ralph Brown|Walter Coy|Allen Russell|Per Barclay|David Thomson|Jose Laurens|Florencio Amarilla|Raul Castro
title: El oro de nadie
